name: Anarchaeologist
description:
Welcome to Anarchaeologist!

After setting your sights on a pyramid in the distance, you grab your trust pistol and your scribbled down diploma in archaeology to see what lies inside! Who cares that you might be breaking some ancient, priceless bricks? It's about the spirit of discover and maybe shooting some things, dammit!

Gameplay Controls
  •  MOVEMENT
    •  Left/Right
  • JUMP
    • A
  • MOVE GUN
    • Up/Down
  • FIRE BULLETS
    • B
  • RESTART
    • Return
  • PAUSE
    • Start
Menu Controls 
  • MOVE ARROW
    • Up/Down
    • Left/Right
  • SELECT OPTION
    • A
